ygData.subject: Re: Lens Quest from Akanon in Library
ygData.msgSnippet: ... SPOILER Yup, there is one who looks for Borxx s lens to make a new telescope that can see somethingerather. I imagine that s how you get the observer
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 25 May 1999 11:08:48 -0500, you wrote:

>From: "Vince Montana" <montana@...>
>
>you may have the quest mixed up, there are 2 separate quests, involving the
>lenses, 1 in which you will get the observers staff, don't be confused on
>the quests and make sure you are following the right one,
>
>Danek HealFast
>Leader of the Black Moon
>41 druid
>Mithaniel Marr

SPOILER































Yup, there is one who looks for Borxx's lens to make a new telescope
that can see somethingerather. I imagine that's how you get the
observer staff. However, the 4 frugrins (sp?) are located in each of
the observatories (3 in Steamfont, 1 in Lesser Feydark). You ask them
for the spare telescope lens. 2 of them send you off on quests, the
other two say they don't have any spare telescope lens, come back in a
few more weeks.
--------------------------------------------------
Ben Pocock
bpocock@...
